title: Satsujin yo Konnichiwa
sinopse:
Story 1: Yumiko felt suspicious when she saw her mother smiled at her father's funeral. Not long after, her mother started to become close with a young man and wanted to marry him. Then things started to go really wrong when Yumiko and her best friend stayed at family cottage with her mother and the young man.

Story 2: Sometimes Lilia can see the future through a mirror.
